title: No sound
content: Hi, I have problem with sound in Firefox, there is no sound. I even tried looking in Windows settings but in volume mixer there is no Firefox. I can't listen to anything. I tried to listen something not only on youtube but also other social media and other sites. All drivers aare updated. Do you have any ideas what's wrong and how i can fix it?
creator: CzaCza

title: San Francisco Chronicle e-paper does not display correctly in FF for Android, and often other browsers. Some pages will not scroll below the initial window, but when page is clicked and opened, then closed, the page may display correctly. Very annoying.
content: This has been going on for at least several weeks. SF Chron support escalated the issue to their tech dept (not on site), which claimed that the problem is FF, not them.
creator: dstang4985

title: Suddenly unable to log in to my router with Firefox...
content:
I am unable to log in to my router with Firefox. This is a very recent development. When I go to the router's address, it says Unable to connect. I am on a Mac Studio (OS 15.1), running Firefox 132.0.1. The same thing is happening with Edge, but I can get to the router just fine with Safari and Chrome.

If anyone know why this is happening, your input will be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

P.S. I did make some changes a couple of weeks ago in about:config, but I don't know what settings I changed. I was trying to find out why the computer was constantly accessing my optical drives (I thought it was when a web browser was open, but it turned out to be all of the time). Below is the troubleshooting information:

title: Dowloaded Files 'Moved or Missing
content: I have downloaded several files, but when I go to my finder folder to find them in dowloads or documents, where I saved them, they do not appear. title: Gegevens worden niet geladen bij inloggen/synchronisatie
content: Na een nieuwe besturing en ssd wou ik opnieuw inloggen bij firefox... Helaas, ik kan wel inloggen maar mijn gegevens van mijn account worden niet geladen, extensies, add-ons, bladwijzers, niets kan ik zien. Ik heb al een paar keer opnieuw proberen synchroniseren maar gegevens willen niet laden. Iemand een idee hoe ik dit kan oplossen?

title: Google Nest Signin
content:
I use Firefox as my primary browser. I have always been able to sign in with Google Nest without any problem. I always entered my user name and then my password and I would be logged into my Nest account.

But now I click on my Google account (https://home.nest.com/login/) and then I click on Nest/Sign in/Sign in with Google. Then I just loop around between the two Google pages.

This started a few days ago. I can't figure it out so now I use Chrome or Safari. But I'd much rather use Firefox. Any ideas? Any help is very much appreciated.

Thanks, John
creator: tzk3jk

title: How to speak to Expedia Directly +1 (833)-246-5175
content: How to speak to Expedia Directly +1 (833)-246-5175 When you book a trip on Expedia, sometimes things don't go exactly as planned. Maybe you need to change your flight, cancel a booking, or simply have questions about your reservation. In these situations, speaking to someone at Expedia directly is essential. Fortunately, contacting Expedia is straightforward‚Äîjust call +1 (833)-246-5175 for any queries related to flight cancellations, refunds, or booking changes. In this article, we‚Äôll guide you through how to speak to Expedia directly via +1 (833)-246-5175. We‚Äôll cover topics like how to cancel a flight, get a refund, and resolve other travel-related issues. This number, +1 (833)-246-5175, is your go-to for any Expedia customer service needs. Let‚Äôs dive in! How to Speak to Expedia Directly: Call +1 (833)-246-5175 The fastest way to get help from Expedia is by calling their customer service hotline at +1 (833)-246-5175. Whether you need assistance with a flight, hotel, car rental, or vacation package, this number will connect you to a customer service representative who can help you solve your issue. Why Call +1 (833)-246-5175? Expedia‚Äôs customer service number, +1 (833)-246-5175, is available 24/7, so you can reach out whenever you encounter a problem with your booking. The team is experienced in handling various issues, from flight cancellations and refunds to hotel booking modifications. By speaking to a live agent at +1 (833)-246-5175, you‚Äôll get answers and solutions tailored to your specific situation. How to Get Through Quickly If you‚Äôre calling during peak travel times, there‚Äôs a chance you might face a long wait time when contacting +1 (833)-246-5175. To avoid delays: 1. Call early in the morning or late at night when customer service lines are less busy. 2. Have your travel details ready before dialing +1 (833)-246-5175. This includes your booking number, flight details, and personal information. 3. Use Expedia‚Äôs virtual assistant on the website while you wait on the line at +1 (833)-246-5175 to find quick answers to common questions. +1 (833)-246-5175 Can I cancel my flight and get a refund on Expedia +1 (833)-246-5175 Do you get a refund if you cancel on Expedia How to speak to Expedia Directly +1 (833)-246-5175 +1 (833)-246-5175 How do I get a full refund from Expedia? How to speak to Expedia Directly +1 (833)-246-5175 +1 (833)-246-5175 How to communicate to Expedia Directly How do i cancel my Expedia flight +1 (833)-246-5175 +1 (833)-246-5175 Can i cancel my trip on Expedia and get a refund +1 (833)-246-5175 Can i get 100% refund on flight cancellation Can I Cancel My Flight and Get a Refund on Expedia? +1 (833)-246-5175 Sometimes, plans change, and you may need to cancel your flight. The good news is that Expedia allows you to cancel most flights. However, whether or not you‚Äôll receive a refund depends on the type of ticket you booked. To cancel your flight and discuss refund options, call +1 (833)-246-5175. Expedia‚Äôs representatives can walk you through the process of canceling your flight and inform you if your ticket qualifies for a refund. How to Cancel Your Expedia Flight +1 (833)-246-5175 To cancel your flight, follow these steps: 1. Log into your Expedia account and go to ‚ÄúMy Trips.‚Äù 2. Select the trip you want to cancel and follow the cancellation instructions. 3. If you face any issues or have specific questions, call +1 (833)-246-5175 to speak directly with an Expedia representative. Do You Get a Refund If You Cancel on Expedia? +1 (833)-246-5175 How to speak to Expedia Directly +1 (833)-246-5175 When you cancel a flight, hotel, or vacation package through Expedia, you may be eligible for a refund. title: {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta?
content: {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta? Traveling with Delta Airlines can be a smooth experience, but sometimes plans change, and you might find yourself asking, "Can you change passengers on a flight with Delta?" Understanding the airline‚Äôs policies regarding passenger name changes is crucial to avoid confusion and ensure a hassle-free travel experience. In this comprehensive article, we will explore the ins and outs of changing passengers on Delta flights, how to manage your booking online, and what to do if you need further assistance. For immediate help, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact Delta customer service at {833-246-4265}. Understanding Delta‚Äôs Policy on Passenger Changes When it comes to changing passengers on a Delta flight, it‚Äôs important to clarify what this means. Delta does not allow the transfer of a ticket from one person to another. If you have booked a ticket and can no longer use it, you will need to cancel the original ticket and purchase a new one for the new traveler. {833-246-4265} Can You Change Passengers on a Flight Delta? No, Delta Airlines does not permit changing the name of the passenger on a flight ticket to another individual. This policy is standard across the airline industry, as tickets are non-transferable. However, if you find yourself in a situation where a passenger can no longer travel, you have a couple of options: 1. Cancel the Existing Ticket: If the original passenger can no longer fly, you can cancel their ticket. Traveling with Delta Airlines can be a smooth experience, but sometimes plans change, and you might find yourself asking, "Can you change passengers on a flight with Delta?" Understanding the airline‚Äôs policies regarding passenger name changes is crucial to avoid confusion and ensure a hassle-free travel experience. In this comprehensive article, we will explore the ins and outs of changing passengers on Delta flights, how to manage your booking online, and what to do if you need further assistance. For immediate help, don‚Äôt hesitate to contact Delta customer service at {833-246-4265}. Understanding Delta‚Äôs Policy on Passenger Changes When it comes to changing passengers on a Delta flight, it‚Äôs important to clarify what this means. Delta does not allow the transfer of a ticket from one person to another. If you have booked a ticket and can no longer use it, you will need to cancel the original ticket and purchase a new one for the new traveler. {833-246-4265} Can You Change Passengers on a Flight Delta? No, Delta Airlines does not permit changing the name of the passenger on a flight ticket to another individual. This policy is standard across the airline industry, as tickets are non-transferable. However, if you find yourself in a situation where a passenger can no longer travel, you have a couple of options: 1. Cancel the Existing Ticket: If the original passenger can no longer fly, you can cancel their ticket. Delta‚Äôs cancellation policy may apply, which could result in a credit for future travel, depending on the fare class. 2. Book a New Ticket: The new passenger will need to book their ticket separately. This process involves purchasing a new ticket at the current fare rate. For more details or assistance, you can always reach out to Delta customer service at {833-246-4265}. {833-246-4265} How to Change Name on Delta Ticket Online If you‚Äôre looking to change the name on a Delta ticket for the same passenger (e.g., fixing a typo), here‚Äôs how you can do that online: 1. Visit the Delta Website: Start by going to the official Delta Airlines website. 2. Manage My Booking: Click on ‚ÄúManage My Booking‚Äù on the homepage. {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta? 3. Enter Booking Information: Input your confirmation number and the last name of the passenger to access the booking. 4. Select the Flight: Choose the specific flight for which you wish to make the name change. 5. Name Change Option: Look for the option to change the name. Follow the prompts to enter the corrected name. 6. Payment: If a fee applies to your name change, complete the payment process. 7. Confirmation: Make sure to check your email for a confirmation of the change. If you need assistance during this process, don‚Äôt hesitate to call Delta customer service at {833-246-4265}. {833-246-4265} Can I Change the Name on a Delta Ticket? Yes, you can change the name on a Delta ticket, but this is typically limited to minor corrections. For example, if there‚Äôs a spelling error in the passenger's name, you can correct that without any significant hassle. However, major name changes (like changing the last name due to marriage) may require more documentation and could incur a fee. Always check Delta‚Äôs specific policies or call customer service at {833-246-4265} to understand your options. {833-246-4265} How Can You Easily Change Your Name on a Delta Flight Ticket? Determine the Type of Change: Identify whether you are making a minor correction or a major change. 3. Use Online Features: For minor corrections, utilize the online booking management feature. For significant changes, you may need to call Delta customer service. 4. Contact Customer Service: If in doubt or if you encounter any issues, call {833-246-4265} for assistance. {833-246-4265} Can You Change Your Name on a Plane Ticket Delta? Yes, Delta allows you to change your name on a plane ticket, but only under certain conditions. Minor changes, such as correcting a typo, can usually be done without a fee. Major changes may require additional steps and possibly documentation to verify the new name. {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta? Reach Out via Social Media: Delta is active on social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook, where they often respond quickly to inquiries. {833-246-4265} How Do I Talk to a Live Person at Delta Airlines? To talk to a live person at Delta Airlines, follow these steps: 1. Dial Customer Service: Call {833-246-4265}. 2. Listen to the Menu: Pay attention to the automated menu options and select the one that pertains to your issue. 3. Wait for a Representative: You‚Äôll be placed in a queue, and once it‚Äôs your turn, you‚Äôll be connected to a live agent. {833-246-4265} How Do I Talk to Someone at Delta? If you need to talk to someone at Delta, here are your options: ‚óè Phone Support: The quickest way is to call {833-246-4265}. Have your booking details ready to expedite the conversation. ‚óè In-Person Help: If you‚Äôre at an airport, you can visit a Delta service desk for direct assistance. ‚óè Online Chat: Use the Delta website or app to chat with a customer service agent for quick answers. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) {833-246-4265} 1. Can I change the name on my ticket to a different passenger? {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta? No, Delta does not allow you to transfer a ticket to another passenger. The original ticket must be canceled, and a new ticket purchased. {833-246-4265} 2. What is Delta's policy on name changes? Delta allows minor name corrections without a fee. Major changes may require additional documentation and potentially incur a fee. {833-246-4265} 3. How do I cancel a ticket if I can‚Äôt travel? To cancel a ticket, log into your Delta account, navigate to ‚ÄúManage My Booking,‚Äù and follow the prompts to cancel. {833-246-4265} 4. Will I receive a refund if I cancel my ticket? Refund policies depend on the fare type. Some tickets may be eligible for a refund, while others may only provide a credit for future travel. {833-246-4265} 5. Can I change my name after checking in? Once checked in, you generally cannot change your name on the ticket. It‚Äôs best to handle changes before this stage. {833-246-4265} 6. What do I need to change my name on a Delta ticket? You may need documentation, such as a marriage certificate or court order, for major name changes. {833-246-4265} 7. Is there a fee for changing my name on a Delta ticket? Fees for name changes depend on whether it‚Äôs a minor correction or a major change. Always confirm with Delta customer service. {833-246-4265} 8. How long does it take to process a name change? Typically, name changes are processed immediately online or over the phone. Always check for a confirmation email. {833-246-4265} 9. Can I change my ticket to a different flight? You can change your flight, but this usually involves a fee, depending on the fare type. {833-246-4265} Can you change passengers on a flight Delta? {833-246-4265} 10. What should I do if my name is misspelled on my ticket? If you find a misspelling, contact Delta immediately at {833-246-4265} to rectify the issue. In conclusion, changing passengers on a Delta flight is not permitted; however, you can manage your booking for name corrections or cancellations effectively. title: Can't play games on Firefox
content: I used Firefox almost since its inception. But I stopped using it when one of my games on Facebook kept asking to upgrade flash player in order to play. I know that flash player is no more and the problem likely lies with the game but I can play the game on every other browser without that message so finally I stopped using Firefox. Is there a setting I can use so that I can go back to my favorite browser and play my game with it also?

title: logitech G560 no sound in Firefox Browser
content: I use Firefox and Thunderbird for Windows and Android, they are my favorites, now I have been struggling with problems in the Firefox browser for Windows 7 with the Logitech G560 sound. title: Firefox changes display language on Gmail "choose account" screen
content:
I am located in Israel, but have set my default display language to English.

Over the past few weeks, when I go from the Google search page (my home screen in Firefox) to Gmail, the "select account" screen displays in Hebrew rather than English. Once I've selected an email account, however, the display reverts to English.

This is a minor annoyance, as I can easily navigate the Hebrew page, but it is a recent change, and I can find no explanation for it.

I have checked to see whether the problem occurs in another browser (Chrome) and it does not.

Any help would be appreciated
creator: john.s.young1

title: Download translation models to stand-alone computer
content: I want to run Firefox Translation on a computer without access to the Internet. When I select Download languages for offline translation, where are the models saved? I want to save the models on a computer connected to internet and move them to the stand-alone computer without internet access.

title: History page by page
content: I would like to be able to see a history list of ALL pages AS VISITED. For example, I will go to search engine and enter say "mozilla". I will click on an item that comes up, then back to the search. Click on another item in the search page, then back to the search, etc, etc. However the "history" in firefox does not list the visits back to the search engine, why not?? How can I get a complete history list of sites as visited? I need this so I can get back to the search where I was last when I visit one of those annoying sites such as "https://inacal.isolutions.iso.org/obp/ui#!iso:std:iso:8124:-1:ed-5:v1:en" which somehow blocks the back button. Actually that is another question, how can we stop sites from disabling the back button?

title: Downloading any content doesn't start
content: Starting from the previous weekend I cannot downlad any files, e.g. email attachments (from Gmail, however the preview works fine) or bank account statements... I simply click on the download button, but nothing happens. Stopping add-ons does not help, neither does updating firefox, clearing cache, restarting PC. Chrome works fine.

content:

creator: daniel.pinheirojr

title: History and Password recovery
content:
Hello Firefox, hope this email finds you well.

I am in a bit of a fix at the moment and would very much appreciate your assistance. The problem is I was using Firefox on my old windows account (same PC, new OS). Unfortunately my system crashed so I had to reinstall a new OS, with that I was not able to make any backups of history or passwords and I really need them, they are very important to me. I used this same email for it and I also have this same email on another laptop which is windows 10.

Please kindly assist me in this regard, I want my history and passwords back. How do you suppose I go about getting them, I am up for any and all verification to prove it belongs to me. I can list some websites I have accessed and saved its credentials and any other info you might need. I plead with you to help me get these back please.

Thank you, Patrick.
creator: patrickkesh90

title: Issue with adding a certificate in the certificate manager.
content:
I'm trying to add the zscaler certificate (my company uses it) to firefox using the certificate manager. When i select the certificate and click import, nothing happens. The certificate doesn't show up on the list of authorities and there are no error messages.

I'm using firefox in a VM running Ubuntu btw and the certificate I exported from the host machine running Windows.
creator: satit456

title: Authentication failure using a Yubikey (FW 5.7.1) with Firefox 132.0.1 (aarch64) on macOS 15.1 +
content: Using Firefox on macOS 15.1 & 15.2 we get into an authentication loop when using a Yubikey with Firmware 5.7.1. This can be tested on the Webauthn.io test page Once you created an account with a PIN and subsequently try to login, you will asked for a PIN over and over agin.

title: sync is fatally flawed as it can destroy data
content:
Long time user of sync and now totally pissed because I have to discontinue it because I can no longer trust it. It was so useful.

Syncing between mac and windows desktops. On mac suddenly have duplicate folders appear on the bookmark toolbar. Delete the duplicate entries. Later discover that duplicates and original folders have been deleted. Problem compounds when switching to windows to find sync has very helpfully has deleted these folders there too. There was no way to disable syncing to prevent this. So that means when you do something stupid on one instance, you have no way to prevent that mistake from spreading to other computers. Nice one.

No sync-log found on mac to investigate why the folders where duplicated. so no way to file a bug.

All I can do now is disable sync on all computers. Be nice if there was some kind of roll back.
creator: ffdev2

creator: stuartgbush

title: Can't recover prior browser
content:
Hello,

I have Firefox browser and ATT internet and email. I was unable to load email today until I spoke with live ATT tech support. He instructed me in clearing cache and cookies, had me open a private window, then asked me to open another window. He did get my ATT email restored, but when I had 2 windows open I accidentally closed my main window which had many pinned tabs and other tabs I wished to get to. Yes, too many tabs! So I have a new browser which does not have the configuration I want which is the one I had when I first called ATT. So I made a mistake and closed the wrong browser, I knew it as it happened but it was too late, I guess speaking with and listening to the tech messed up my concentration. I have made this mistake before and closed the wrong browser but fumbling around somehow I managed to recover the browser I wanted, I don't remember how exactly. I think it has been a couple of years since I screwed up this way. The History section of my Firefox menu does not offer a selection called 'restore previous session' that the instruction page shows, the only options at the top are Recently closed tabs, Recently closed windows, Search history. Then a bar followed by Clear Recent history, then today's history in the new browser. So I only get history from today's new browser. I am old and not tech savvy there is a lot of terminology I do not understand, I need a kindergartner's step by step instruction on this I am afraid, in clear English. I am afraid to do things like refresh or reinstall without knowing what I am doing. I appreciate your help. I use desktop Firefox for email, reading items of interest, social media, ordering merch. I do not do gaming, I have no website. It is late and I am going to bed soon. You can email me at jaelizlang@att.net. Thanks so much, Jane Langston, Clarkston GA
creator: jaelizlang
